Macros.name: Grilled Lemon Garlic Salmon
Macros.description: A simple and healthy salmon recipe with lemon and garlic for a burst of flavor.

Macros.name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
Macros.description: A refreshing salad made with quinoa, black beans, corn, and a tangy lime dressing.

Macros.name: Spaghetti Squash Primavera
Macros.description: A light and healthy low-carb pasta alternative made with roasted spaghetti squash and vegetables.

Macros.name: Sweet Potato Chickpea Buddha Bowl
Macros.description: A nourishing bowl packed with roasted sweet potatoes, chickpeas, avocado, and tahini dressing.

Macros.name: Greek Chicken Souvlaki with Tzatziki
Macros.description: Grilled chicken marinated with lemon, garlic, and oregano, served with a creamy tzatziki sauce.

Macros.name: Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry
Macros.description: A low-carb alternative to fried rice made with cauliflower rice and loaded with vegetables.

Macros.name: Chia Pudding with Mixed Berries
Macros.description: A simple and nutritious breakfast or snack made with chia seeds, almond milk, and fresh berries.

Macros.name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
Macros.description: A healthy and light zucchini noodle dish with homemade pesto for a fresh flavor.

Macros.name: Turkey and Avocado Lettuce Wraps
Macros.description: A low-calorie, high-protein snack made with turkey and creamy avocado wrapped in crisp lettuce leaves.

Macros.name: Vegetable Lentil Soup
Macros.description: A hearty and fiber-rich soup made with lentils, carrots, celery, and a variety of spices.
